verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
With my heart I cry to You
With my soul I thirst for You
With my flesh I die to You
Holy One, Holy One, I come to You

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
With my lips I shout to You
With my hands I reach to You
With my knees I bow to You
Holy One, Holy One, I come to You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are worthy Lord
You are worthy
You are worthy Lord
You are worthy
